extends java.lang.Object
implements IPluginContext<P>

installPlugin

public void installPlugin(P plugin)
                   throws DuplicateRegistrationException
Description copied from interface: IPluginContext
Installs a Plugin into the PluginContext.

A Plugin in installed in adding its jobs and services to the registrys of the PluginContext and registering it in the PluginRegistry.

Specified by:
installPlugin in interface IPluginContext<P extends IPlugin>
Parameters:
plugin - - the Plugin to be installed
Throws:
DuplicateRegistrationException - if a Plugin with the specified id is allready installed.
